# kCFSocketCloseOnInvalidate

**Global Variable**

When enabled using [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFSocketSetSocketFlags(_:_:)], the native socket associated with a CFSocket object is closed when the CFSocket object is invalidated. When disabled, the native socket remains open. This option is enabled by default.
